name: ClaRify
description:
ClaRify is a falling portal platformer game made for the Wowie Jam 3.0

My name is Kristoffer French-Skog and I'm a Freelance Artist. I'm looking forward to creating quality, custom art. Now I'm investing my time to make my dream games. Check out my portfolio here: https://wazaxe.artstation.com/
My Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?...
My Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wazaxe/
My Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/wazaxesoftware

My Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/lillstoffe-fre...

My Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/WazaXE

My Discord Server: https://discord.gg/kEEYUxb

My Gamejolt: https://wazaxesoftware.gamejolt.io

Stay safe out in the universe.
